item.title: Women and Water - a Video by Water For People
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OoEroQ0hXfs Water For People takes a look at the effects of the global water crisis on women and girls in developing countries. On average, women and girls carry 40 pounds of water 3.5 miles every day, hindering their opportunity to work or attend school, and continuing the cycle of poverty.
